content: नर्मन् {%<ab>n.</ab>%} [नॄ-मनिन्] {@--1@} Sport, amusement, diversion, merriment, pleasure, amorous pastime or sport; जितकमले विमले परिकर्मय नर्मजनकमलकं मुखे <ls>Gīt. 12</ls> (कौतुकजनक); <ls>R. 19. 28.</ls> {@--2@} Jest, joke, humour, wit; नर्भप्रायाभिः कथाभिः <ls>K. 70</ls> ‘jocular, humorous’.
